entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
